sections.heading: Repealed.Section 49-7-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1907, ch. 39, § 1; Code 1915, § 856; C.S. 1929, § 29-701; 1941 Comp., § 9-701; 1953 Comp., § 8-7-1; repealed by Laws 2019, ch. 241, § 2.

Repeals.— Laws 2019, ch. 241, § 2 repealed 49-7-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1907, ch. 39, § 1, relating to body corporate, title, power to sue and be sued, effective June 14, 2019. For provisions of former section,seethe 2018 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
